title: Sasheer Wants To Go Back To Wegmans
description:
HI! This week, Nicole and Sasheer talk all things the States of America as well as its partners, could they have lived on their own at 14, why Jordan got put behind the deli counter at the grocery store, their Target strategies, how ANYONE loses their virginity in high school, Nicole snatchin’ babies, why we gotta look out for big tax, and more. We wrap things up by answering listener questions about a friend’s flirty boyfriend, and engaging with a former friend group after a dark season. 

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
